channel.title: Saving Curses
channel.description: I have add 100% curses to my server but i have a problem. I have added an altar which changes your pray book but if i log out it doesn't save them. I am not sure how to save them so it knows what your pray book is.

item.title: Saving Curses
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

this on the top part

} else if (token.equals("Pray-Book")) {
                                                p.altarPrayed = Integer.parseInt(token2);

this at the bottom part

characterfile.newLine();
                        characterfile.write("Pray-Book = ", 0, 12);
                        characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.altarPrayed), 0, Integer.toString(p.altarPrayed).length());

Read full topic

item.title: Saving Curses
item.dc:creator: @kalson744 kalson744
item.description:
@kalson744 wrote:

i suggest to make a command:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("switch") && (playerRights >= 0)){ RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }
[size=12pt]rep++[/size] please?
